text.tspan: Following bids natural; GF unless rebid suit
# $ B R I D G E % ^
High Card Points: A=4, K=3, Q=2, J=1
·Reverse = bid of higher suit than first, at higher lvl
·After (strong) minor suit fit, bid 4-card majors up
the line or look for NT contract.
Fit=3 cards after 1%^; need 4 for Jacoby/splinter
After 2-lvl (invitational) raise, off-suit is game try
Splinter: slam try - cue-bid A's up line or sign off
·2^ is transfer to 3#, responder may correct 3$
This is going to need an entire card on its own to capture all
the intricacies of 1NT bidding, particularly minor suit transfers
and dealing with interference (Lebensohl?). Figure out what
opener shows 5-cd major, weak minor, max w/ 2#-2%^-2NT-3%^
- 5-cd minor/4-cd major GF = transfer, then bid major
- 3m = accept minor, 4M = accept major (may have mA)
- anything else = cue bid, accepting major
Jacoby - super accept w/ 4 trump or v. good 3 & max - retransfer?
Make -- and -> and short = characters? Maybe even a shorter space?
- cue-bidding=any (unassigned) off-suit bid after fit already
When to not open 1NT w/ a 5-cd major: rare exception, i.e.
2 unstopped suits, amazing trump honors, terrible major doubleton
Fit=4 cards (opener may deny fit w/ 3)
Always prefer to show 4-cd major at any strength
After 2#$ raise, look for possible 3NT game
Weak-2 promises 2 honors in long suit (dep vuln)
Raise to 3 with support to further preempt
Sign off in any game (suit or NT)
4 of new minor=4-5 card side suit
w/ max may bid other 5cd major or ask for help
in a minor suit (agrees trump, resp bids 3/4^)
JACOBY: 2$%=xfer to %^ w/ 5 trump, any strength
Opener may bypass w/ 4 trump support:
QUEST: 2#-2$-3$%=xfer to %^ w/ 5-4, inv or GF
May bypass w/ max, good trump/shape:
TEXAS: 4$%=xfer to %^ w/ 6 trump, GF, no slam
MINORS: 2^/2NT=xfer to #$ w/ 6 any or 5 GF
May bypass w/ max, good #$ honors
RETRANSFER: bid suit below target after bypass
Agrees Stayman suit, asks for shape/strength
5#=weak, attempt to sign off in opener's minor
After X, 4# is rescue (to play 4#$), XX is slam try
Minor suit asking: 10+ points (GF) Â 3# SARS
Flat (4333), GF: 3$ ASID to agree with 2%^
